latestPosts.caption:
Join the BEST MAKEUP INSTITUTE IN CHENNAI to become an all rounder and earn in lakhs 🔥 
Become a Certified Professional Makeup artist in just 16 days of intense training and proper knowledge from the right place with the right guidance✨

😊Rekha Makeup Academy’s 16 Days course fees for Makeup , Hairstyle and saree draping - Rs. 50,000/- only with
 *NO EXTRA or HIDDEN CHARGES *

WELCOME GIFTS 🎁* 

 🔸FREE COMPLETE BRIDAL KIT from FOREVER 52 for all Students whoever register for this Course.( no need to spend separately for products) 

*COURSE DETAILS * 
🔸10 Different Makeup looks 
🔸 15+ Different Hairstyles Demos 
🔸 10 Different types of saree styling and Draping , Prepleating & Box Folding 

🔹 All makeup products from High end to affordable range products will be provided by Academy for hands on practice . 
Hairstyling Machines , Hair dummy and hair accessories will be provided for practice 🔹 

 * Additional FREE Courses * 

🔸Free Mehandi class 
🔸 Free Flower Making class 
🔸 Free Nail Art class 
🔸 Free SFX Special Efffect Makeup class 
🔸 Free Amman Makeup Look class 
🔸Free hydration facial class 

😊 BENEFITS We provide for Outstation  students ✌🏻
🔸 Free 3 time homely food 
🔸Free accommodation ( hostel is located in same building of our academy ) 

🔹 FREE items for Portfolio 🔹 

FREE Model 
FREE Costume 
FREE JEWELLERY 
FREE INTERNATIONAL MAKEUP PRODUCTS 
FREE PHOTO SHOOT 
FREE LASHES 
FREE HAIR spray 
FREE Hair extensions or jowri , kunjalam 
FREE comb 
FREE Hair Accessories 
FREE Hair pins ,upins , safety pins ,rubber bands and section clips .

🔹You can save total of Rs.30,000 worth of free benefits that  we provide by joining our makeup course 🔹 

JUST BRING YOUR EMPTY HANDS AND TAKE OUR WELCOME GIFT, COMPLETE KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCE TO EARN IN LAKHS 🔥🔥 

* only Limited seats available to give special attention for each and every student *

💯Next batch May 16-31🔥
💯3 days Masterclass May 1,2 & 3🔥

For registration Please Contact: 
☎️9566031245
